name: GitHub Advanced Security Agent
description: Security-focused AI agent that performs code scanning, secret detection, dependency analysis, and security review automation integrated with GitHub repositories

skills.name: Code Security Scanning
skills.description: Analyze code for security vulnerabilities including SQL injection, XSS, path traversal, and other OWASP Top 10 issues using CodeQL
examples: Scan this PR for security issues

skills.name: Secret Detection
skills.description: Detect accidentally committed secrets including API keys, passwords, tokens, and certificates in code and commit history
examples: Check if this commit exposes credentials
Find AWS keys in code history

skills.name: Dependency Vulnerability Analysis
skills.description: Analyze project dependencies for known vulnerabilities and suggest secure upgrade paths with compatibility assessment
examples: Assess breaking changes in security patch

skills.name: Automated Security Review
skills.description: Perform automated security review of pull requests with contextual analysis of security implications

skills.name: Security Fix Suggestions
skills.description: Generate secure code suggestions and automated fix PRs for detected vulnerabilities
examples: Generate secure version of this function
Create PR to fix dependency vulnerability

skills.name: Security Policy Compliance
skills.description: Verify code and configurations comply with security policies and standards like SOC2, HIPAA, and PCI-DSS requirements
